title: Minecraft Server
body:
There's a minecraft server being hosted by some people on the North American server but right now they're searching for more people to come in and join so I thought I'd ask you guys if any of you are interested.
The server address is:
gd.beastmc.com

I'm not an admin or anything but I do play on the server from time to time, so it'd be cool if you come on over to the server and say hi.

It's vanilla minecraft and PVP is disabled

Here's the link to the original post:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/96pPJoeh-gd-minecraft-server-info-discussion

replies.body: um this is a league of legends board.. get that out of here!!

> [{quoted}](name=RLG Shaky,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YlI8Wj5z,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-03T02:27:01.575+0000)
>
> um this is a league of legends board.. get that out of here!!

It's run by a group of people who play league, if you're not interested that's fine just thought I would ask.
